item.title: Dance Overview
item.description: With budgets cuts in schoolâ€™s art, music and dance education has been affected ad-versely. Dance education is an important part of art education and has demonstrated its important function and place in institutions and theater. Dance education makes an impact in the development of young children. It helps children improve coordina-tion and social abilities while also helping as a form of physical education. The dance routine and training improve perception and imagination which plays a role in mental and healthy growth.
